snippet: The family of Dr. Abbas Khan had been expecting his release this week but was informed that he had died.
lead_paragraph: The family of Dr. Abbas Khan had been expecting his release this week but was informed that he had died.
abstract: Britain warns Syria that it will hold government of Pres Bashar al-Assad responsible if Dr Abbas Khan, British surgeon incarcerated for more than a year for treating civilians in Syrian civil war, has died mysteriously in prison, as his family claims.

headline.main: Britain Warns Syria After Report of Imprisoned Doctor’s Death
headline.print_headline: Britain Warns Syria After Report of Imprisoned Doctor’s Death

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Kimiko de Freytas-Tamura from London; Anne Barnard and Hwaida Saad from Beirut, Lebanon; and Rick Gladstone from New York.
